Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Fulton
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Fulton, Oakley, Hubbard and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Fulton, Oakley, Hubbard and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Fulton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
